results.name: a(n) = A161415(n+1)/4.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
formula: a(n) = A048883(n), except a(n) = A048883(n) - (n+1)/2 if n is a power of 2 minus 1. - _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 06 2014
